item.title: The Shardlands
item.description: The Shardlands The lands scattered with scars from the Commonization wars and unclaimed as civilization concentrated from Industrialization & Regulation.

item.title: The Trinity Kingdom
item.description: The Trinity Kingdom A still-standing nation established before Commonization only grown more powerful as some initial families hedged their bets on improving an existing civilization rather than trying to found their own.

item.title: Modernization
item.description: Modernization The discoveries of the Renaissance launched civilization into a new era littered with new creations based on hardlight.

item.title: Seeker
item.description: Seeker An occupation focused on the discovery and extraction of Gems to replenish stockpiles and reserves.

item.title: Commonization
item.description: Commonization Gems have always existed, but the few gems that were discovered were of too powerful a generation to be handled safely.

item.title: Gem Types
item.description: Gem Types The type of a gem determines the intrinsic component of the power.

item.title: Runes
item.description: Runes Inscription writing used to direct, manipulate, and regulate the released power of Gems; and they appear most commonly on equipment to safely deliver power to the body or on machines to convert that power into energy while minimizing Strain.

item.title: Resilience
item.description: Resilience A measure of matter’s intrinsic resistance to Strain. Dependent on gem-type.

item.title: Refinement
item.description: Refinement The manipulation of projected hardlight into shapes or constructs.
